headline: Copper Is Beating Gold. What Lies Ahead for the Bronze Metal’s Rally.
summary: Copper has gained more than 20% so far in 2025, outpacing gold’s 13% year-to-date gain.  While rising copper prices are often seen as a sign of growing industrial and consumer demand, this year’s spike seems to be more about President Donald Trump’s tariffs.  Gold  may be enjoying a record run this year, but the precious metal’s stodgier industrial metal cousin  copper  is shining, too.
